meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Lawrence Agu, III, AICP, Assoc AIA

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the May 2, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing and May 9, 2024 Special Called City Plan Commission ForwardDallas Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Development Plan Case 24-1601
agenda_items.description: An application for a development plan on property zoned Subdistrict S-1a South Zone, within Planned Development District No. 521.

agenda_items.title: Development Plan Case 24-1602
agenda_items.description: An application for a development plan on property zoned Planned Development District No. 889.

agenda_items.title: Development Plan Case 24-1603
agenda_items.description: An application for a development plan on property zoned Subdistrict 2E within Planned Development District No. 305.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case 24-1604
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2418 for a bed and breakfast use.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Cases - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for an auto service center and vehicle display.

agenda_items.title: Development Code Amendment
agenda_items.description: Consideration of amending Chapter 51A, the Dallas Development Code.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Case 24-1620
agenda_items.description: An application to replat a 40.242-acre tract of land.
